optionList.name: input
optionList.description: The markdown file to process. File extension can be ommitted.

optionList.name: output
optionList.description: The relative bundle output directory. Will be created if it doesn't exist. [default: "output"]

optionList.name: watch
optionList.description: When set it watches for changes in the input file and rebuilds the presentation.

content:
mrend --input example.md --output output
mrend -i example.md -o output
mrend example
